mean_cn: n. 切碎物；  v. 切碎，小步走路
mean_en: to cut food, especially meat, into very small pieces using a special machine (called a mincer); to walk with quick short steps, in a way that is not natural
sentence: This beef mince will be soon be mixed with the egg yolk as part of the recipe.
sentence_trans: 根据食谱，这碗牛肉碎要马上加入蛋黄进行搅拌。
